description.en:
Tsukimori Kaede is an editor of a mystery stories magazine and she's in charge of Uesugi Kenji, an author who usually hands his handscripts late.

Kaede has always been a fan of Uesugi-sensei and she becomes attracted to his usual acts of kindness, but since he told her he won't lay a hand on his workmates", hers is an unrequited love.

However, Kaede is suddenly notified that Uesugi-sensei's editor will be changed...?!

(Source: Go-K Fansub)
